ComicInfo.Summary:
Graveyard of Vengeance: An Indian Chief curses all white men on his ground when his family is killed by English soldiers during the Revolutionary War.
Death of a Ghost: Jan and Clayton Butler try to move into a haunted mansion. Mr. Devereux has a machine that will remove the ghost that occupies the mansion.
The Eye of Evil: Alois Hitler can see the hate in his son's eyes but nobody will believe him.
Death Came Creeping: Abdul Mahmoud has a cat that is better than any security system or safe at protecting him and his belongings.
ComicInfo.Title: Graveyard of Vengeance; Death of a Ghost; The Eye of Evil; Death Came Creeping
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
